title: Design of 2D/2D ZnIn2S4/MgAl-LDH coreâ€“shell nanostructures toward enhanced photodegradation of organic dyes
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00340C, Paper
Qiang Gao, Lingchun Ye, Wei Liu, Junxi Li, Yuchen Cui, Naicai Xu, Mingjin Zhang
ZnIn2S4/MgAl-LDH heterojunctions with close interfacial contact were successfully fabricated and employed for effective photocatalytic degradation of organic dyes.
